titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4200) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1989 for certain maritime programs of the Department of Transportation and the Federal Maritime Commission.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-804.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 7/27/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4200 (maritime programs).
